publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1277 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Suspension of Standing Ordersâ€”That the Parliament agrees that Rules 13.6.2 and 13.6.3 of the Standing Orders be suspended for the duration of the Meetings of the Parliament for the week beginning Monday 23 October 2000 and that Rule 5.6.1 (c) of the Standing Orders be suspended for the duration of the Meeting of the Parliament on Thursday 26 October 2000. Supported by: Iain Smith*
